document.full_text: barclays plc  is disputing a court order that lays out to which of lehman brothers holdings inc's  assets barclays is entitled from its rushed 2008 purchase of the company's north american arm.
document.title: barclays balks at lehman trial order over assets
lines_and_colors: barclays plc  is disputing a court order that lays out to which of lehman brothers holdings inc's  assets barclays is entitled from its rushed 2008 purchase of the company's north american arm.
